material_pressure_advance_enable.label: Enable Pressure Advance Control
material_pressure_advance_enable.description:
Enables control of Pressure Advance in Klipper firmware. This feature can greatly sharpen the appearance of corners, improve line width consistency and reduce the need for retraction during non-extrusion moves. Supports control of individual mesh objects and multiple extruders.

NOTE: Unchecking this feature will not disable an existing Pressure Advance value in Klipper config. To disable Pressure Advance, enable control and set necessary values to '0'.

This plugin is NOT compatible with Marlin's Linear Advance.

material_pressure_advance_factor.label: Pressure Advance Factor
material_pressure_advance_factor.description:
Extrusion coefficient for Pressure Advance in Klipper firmware.

Common values are '0.01 - 0.10' for direct drive and '0.20 - 0.80' for bowden extruders. Very high values will result in large extruder movements when accelerating/decelerating, which may result in missed extruder steps and other issues. Recommended for most users to avoid values above '0.50' when possible. Adjustments are often necessary for different materials.

A value of '0' will command Klipper to disable Pressure Advance. Changing any subsequent feature values will override this setting.

material_pressure_advance_factor_infill.label: Infill Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_infill.description:
Pressure Advance factor when printing infill. Adjustments could be used to minimize excessive extruder movements for certain infill types and high print speeds but reducing too much may increase stringing.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_wall.label: Wall Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_wall.description:
Pressure Advance factor used when printing walls. Optimized values can sharpen the appearance of corners, reduce bulging and optimize extrusion consistency when varying print speeds.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_wall_0.label: Outer Wall Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_wall_0.description:
Pressure Advance factor used for the outermost wall. Optimized values can greatly improve the appearance of corners.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_wall_x.label: Inner Wall Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_wall_x.description:
Pressure Advance factor used only for inner walls.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_topbott.label: Top/Bottom Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_topbott.description:
Pressure Advance factor used for top/bottom skin layers. Optimized value can improve surface appearance and line width consistency for these layers. High values may lead to excessive extruder movements.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_support.label: Support Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_support.description:
Pressure Advance factor used for support infill and interface structures. Adjustments could be used to minimize excessive extruder movements while potentially increase stringing.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature. Most users will not benefit from adjusting these values.

material_pressure_advance_factor_support.label: Support Infill Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_support.description:
Pressure Advance factor used only for support infill.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_support.label: Support Interface Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_support.description:
Pressure Advance factor used only for the support interface.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.

material_pressure_advance_factor_prime_t.label: Prime Tower Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_prime_t.description:
Pressure Advance factor used when printing a prime tower.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature. Most users will not benefit from adjusting this value.

material_pressure_advance_factor_skirt_b.label: Skirt/Brim Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_skirt_b.description:
Pressure Advance factor used when printing skirts or brims.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.
material_pressure_advance_factor_skirt_b.enabled: resolveOrValue('material_pressure_advance_enable') and (resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'skirt' or resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'brim' or resolveOrValue('draft_shield_enabled') or resolveOrValue('ooze_shield_enabled'))

material_pressure_advance_factor_layer_0.label: Initial Layer Pressure Advance
material_pressure_advance_factor_layer_0.description:
Pressure Advance factor used only during the first layer. Value will override every mesh object feature setting. Adjusting could be used to optimize line width consistency when varying print speed for this layer.

A value of '0' disables pressure advance for this feature.
